title: Amazon is closing all bookstores, pop-up locations, and “4-star” locations
content:
Amazon is an online store first and foremost, but the company has attempted a few experiments with physical retail locations over the years. However, Amazon confirmed on Wednesday that most of those experiments are coming to an end, as the company aims to close all 68 of its physical stores in the United States and

The post Amazon is closing all bookstores, pop-up locations, and “4-star” locations appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Amazon is closing all 68 of its Amazon 4-star stores, Amazon Books locations, and other pop-up locations in the US and UK.
